system.description:
Effect: Grass Knot's Power is dependent on the target's Weight Class: 
20 vs WC 1, 40 vs WC 2 & 3, 60 vs WC 4, 80 vs WC 5, 6, 7, 100 vs WC 8, 9, 10, and 120 vs WC 11+.
